channel.title: Software Development on TechoTom
channel.description: Recent content in Software Development on TechoTom

item.title: MethodNotFoundException using Tomcat inside Eclipse
item.description: running tomcat (actually vfabric tc) in eclipse (actually STS) and using a web deployment descriptor thingo. it worked when you built using maven and deployed manually and when you looked in the debugger you'd see the right class source but the object itself wouldn't have the property/method. problem caused by updating a dependency JAR version and updating it in the referencing POM but the deployment descriptor is never updated because the POM is missing:
